name: Light Avocado Egg Salad
author: K-Dub
summary: I love egg salad but was always looking for a healthier option for the mayo. I had an abundance of avocados one day and decided to experiment. I'm sure glad I did! Serve with crackers, bread, or just by itself. Hope you enjoy this recipe as much as I do!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Chop eggs and transfer to a salad bowl
Mash avocado in a separate bowl using a fork
Mix mashed avocado, yellow mustard, and paprika into eggs until thoroughly combined
Season with salt and black pepper
